name: food_offer_promo
description: Bold grilled chicken ad with yellow-orange background and central product image.

samples.product_description: Tender grilled chicken served with fresh vegetables and homemade sauce

fieldPrompt.product_image: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality image of your dish with transparent background. Include specific details about the food presentation, lighting, composition, and styling. The food should be professionally photographed with good lighting, showcasing its best features and making it look appetizing and irresistible.
fieldPrompt.product_name: Enter the name of your dish (max 17 characters) that makes it appealing and descriptive. Examples: Tandoori Chicken, Paneer Tikka Masala, Butter Naan. Use names that highlight key ingredients or cooking methods.
fieldPrompt.product_description: Write a mouth-watering description (max 50 characters) that highlights key ingredients and what makes it special. Examples: Marinated in secret spices and grilled to perfection, Fresh ingredients, authentic flavors. Use sensory words that make people want to try it.
fieldPrompt.price: Enter the price in INR (e.g., ₹299, ₹499) with currency symbol and any relevant unit (per plate/kg/piece). Make it clear and easy to read for customers.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Select a hex color code (e.g., #D32F2F for red, #FF9800 for orange) that matches your restaurant's branding and creates appetite appeal. This color will be used for accents and highlights.
fieldPrompt.contact_text: Create a short call-to-action (max 20 characters) that encourages immediate action. Examples: Order Now, Call Us, Get 10% Off, Free Delivery. Make it compelling and action-oriented.
fieldPrompt.contact_number: Provide a contact number (max 20 characters) where customers can reach you, including country code if needed. Examples: +91 98765 43210, +1 (555) 123-4567. Make it easy to read and contact.
fieldPrompt.address_line1: Enter the first line of your restaurant's address (max 50 characters). Examples: 123 Food Street, Near Central Park, 456 Main Road, Downtown. Include the street address and nearby landmarks.
fieldPrompt.address_line2: Enter the second line of your address (max 50 characters), typically including city, state, and PIN code. Examples: Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, New York, NY 10001. Complete the location information.
fieldPrompt.username: Enter your restaurant's name or brand username (max 30 characters) as you'd like it to appear on the promo. Examples: @restaurantname, @foodieplace, Your Restaurant Name. Use your preferred branding.
fieldPrompt.logo_url: Upload your restaurant's logo. For best results, use a high-resolution image with a transparent background in PNG format.
